body.para: This option tells the compiler to only parse the source. Will not do any semantic or syntax checks. Is only useful when used as an embedded parser, such as from the X# intellisense system inside Visual Studio. Does not produce the output exe, dll or pdb
+ | - Specifying +, or just /parseonly, tells the compiler to only parse the source code.
This option has no normal use. It is only useful when running the compiler embedded. Use /s in stead
